event.descr:
alIniatingProcess %parm[#1]%;

fastUpdates(10) smf(50) smfRouter(60) quotaManagement(70) eventDistributer(80) highAvailability(90) pcc(100)

alProvisioningType %parm[#2]%;

start(0) stop(1) timeout(2)

alFailCause %parm[#3]%;

unknownCause(0) invalidParam(1) subscriberLimit(2) domainNotFound(3) unknownSubscriber(4) communicationError(5) subscriberTimeout(6) smpNodeStartup(7) heartbeatSwitchover(8) passiveNodeNotSynched(9) passiveNodeDown(10) hostNoActive(11) ipNotAssignedToHost(12) unknownIp(14)

alSubscriberName %parm[#4]%;

alSubscriberIp %parm[#5]%;
